trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that arranges items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u een venster dat rangschikt items in een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> panel.
trans-unit.target: De onderliggende elementen in deze aangebrachte <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref> Configuratiescherm.

trans-unit.source: The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: De grootte die het <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"> </xref> moet positie van de onderliggende elementen.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: De onderliggende elementen in deze maatregelen <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel"> </xref> ter voorbereiding van rangschik ze tijdens de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel.ArrangeOverride*>nageleefd.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryItemsPanel.ArrangeOverride*>
